name: 2024 11th International Conference on Wireless Communication and Sensor Networks (icWCSN 2024)
content: Conference Proceedings: The accepted papers will be included into icWCSN 2024 Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 979-8-4007-0900-5), which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Authors will be invited to deliver presentation on conference.
